roleset.name: defecate slangily
roleset.note: CRAP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Member of VNcls breathe-40.1.2-1. Comparison to shit-v.01. (from crap.01-v)

example.name: with GOL
example.text: If they-1 wanted [*-1] to crap all over the $ they could do it on a whim - no other country on the planet has the ability to do so , let alone devalued their currency to such an extent it makes their exports look ridiculously cheap .

example.name: Both args, and Ouch.
example.text: Jeff was training so hard he crapped a medicine ball.

roleset.name: generally not very good
roleset.note: CRAPPY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Relation to crap. (from crappy.01-j)

example.name: Not very? A lot?
example.text: But u know how crappy -LRB- pun intended -RRB- constipation can be . Also feeling like they are doing something , not helpless , can be impt / helpful for some

roleset.name: unskilled at
roleset.note: CRAPPY-J NOTES: Added by Julia in comparison to bad.02 (from crappy.02-j)

example.name: not very good at
example.text: He's crappy at making constipation puns that make sense.
example.arg: at making constipation puns that make sense.

roleset.name: anti-beneficial
roleset.note: CRAPPY-J NOTES: Added by Julia in comparison to bad.03. (from crappy.03-j)

example.name: and THAT is how it's done.
example.text: Prune juice is crappy for sufferers of diarrhea.
